name: Tobu Tobu Bōzu
description:
The year is Neo New Kyoto. Happiness is a rare commodity in this dreary cyberpunk dystopia. Faced with a ceaseless rain, it's up to a lone teru teru bōzu to ward off the downpour. The only method being to platform up to the top of the labyrinthian amalgamation of various buildings that mars the skyline, and hang from the tallest eaves in the city.

Can the future be saved? No, of course not. But perhaps, by your actions, you can help to provide some much needed sunlight to the disheveled masses. Your mission--much like the lives of the struggling Neo New Kyotoites--will be short and difficult. 

Move with the D-Pad. Hold the A button to charge your jump, release the A button to jump. It's really that simple.
